>>===== MODE =====>>
citation
<<===== MODE =====<<



>>===== RESULT =====>>
>>[0] 10, ยง 100
<<===== RESULT =====<<

>>===== OPTIONZ =====>>
{
   "static_statute_locator":false,
   "clobber_locator_if_no_statute_section":false,
   "handle_parallel_articles": false
}
<<===== OPTIONZ =====<<


>>===== CITATIONS =====>>
[
    [
        {
            "citationID": "CITATION-1", 
            "citationItems": [
                {
                    "id": "ITEM-1", 
                    "label": "page", 
                    "locator": "sec. 100"
                }
            ], 
            "properties": {
                "noteIndex": 1
            }
        }, 
        [], 
        []
    ]
]
<<===== CITATIONS =====<<

>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.1mlz1"
      demote-non-dropping-particle="display-and-sort">
  <info>
    <title>Test fixture</title>
    <id>http://citationstyles.org/tests/fixture</id>
    <link href="http://citationstyles.org/tests/fixture" rel="self"/>
    <link href="http://citationstyles.org/documentation/text" rel="documentation"/>
    <category citation-format="author-date"/>
    <updated>2014-04-30T13:19:38+00:00</updated>
    <rights license="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/">This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 License</rights>
  </info>
  <macro name="x-juris-locator">
    <group delimiter=" ">
      <choose>
        <if locator="page"/>
        <else>
          <label variable="locator"/>
        </else>
      </choose>
      <number variable="locator"/>
    </group>
  </macro>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <group delimiter=", ">
        <number variable="page"/>
        <group delimiter=" ">
          <text value="at"/>
          <group require="empty-label">
            <text macro="x-juris-locator" label-form="symbol"/>
          </group>
        </group>
        <group reject="empty-label">
          <text macro="x-juris-locator" label-form="symbol"/>
        </group>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
	{
		"id": "ITEM-1",
		"type": "legislation",
		"page": "10"
	}
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
